conversation.Name: Sophia
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Can you please tell us why the train is delayed?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: I heard there was an issue with the tracks up ahead.

conversation.Name: Sophia
conversation.Text: Oh, that doesn't sound good. Do you know how long the delay will be?

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the inconvenience. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: Thank you for the update. We appreciate your efforts to keep us informed.
